T02D3648:260b-1: a'arya mee tri ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3648:260b-4: rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3648:260b-5: thog mar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3648:260b-6: du yi ge meem gser gyi mdog can las 'od
T02D3648:260b-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
T02D3648:260b-9: rgyal ba byams pa nyid gtso byas pas yang dag par bkug ste /
T02D3648:260b-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka
T02D3648:260b-11: tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha na ka ro
T02D3648:260b-12: mi zhes bya bas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du song
T02D3648:260b-13: bas / aom badzra pushpam a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3648:260b-14: aom badzra dh'u pam a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D3648:260b-15: aom badzra d'i pam a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D3648:260b-17: aom badzra nee bi dhyam a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D3648:260b-18: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs pas mchod pa'i tshogs phul la /
T02D3648:260b-19: de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3648:260b-20: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3648:261a-5: snying rje dang dga' ba dang /
T02D3648:261a-6: btang snyoms las tshangs pa'i gnas ba la sogs par yid la bya'o //
T02D3648:261a-7: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3648:261a-8: zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum gyi bar du brjod de /
T02D3648:261a-9: brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa goms par byas pa'i bag chags kyi dbang du gyur pa /
T02D3648:261a-10: rang gi sems dang mig 'phrul mkhan gyis nye bar sprul pa'i sems can dang /
T02D3648:261a-11: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrul pa'i dri ma sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3648:261a-13: khug rna dang du ba dang /
T02D3648:261a-15: sprin gyi grib ma dang bral ba /
T02D3648:261a-16: ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' lta bur
T02D3648:261a-17: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D3648:261a-18: du phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po
T02D3648:261a-19: ma lus pa rnam par blta par bya'o //
T02D3648:261a-20: de ltar yud tsam zhig rnam par dag pa'i rang
T02D3648:261a-21: bzhin rab tu rtog pa nam mkha' rdo rje'i ting
T02D3648:261a-22: nge 'dzin te / de la gnas pa pam las padma dang /
T02D3648:261a-23: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D3648:261a-24: yi ge mee zhes bya ba'i 'od kyis phyi nang dang snod bcud mtha' dag sbyangs te /
T02D3648:261a-25: thub pa skyes mchog byams pa ni //
T02D3648:261a-26: zhal gsum spyan gsum gyis rnam brgyan //
T02D3648:261a-27: de yi gdan ni padma ste //
T02D3648:261a-28: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ;
T02D3648:261a-29: / phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02D3648:261a-30: bla med chos ston phyag rgya yis //
T02D3648:261a-31: phyag gnyis dang po rnam par brgyan //
T02D3648:261a-32: phyag g-yas gnyis pa nyer bskyod pas //
T02D3648:261a-33: mchog tu sems can skyong ba po //
T02D3648:261a-34: g-yon phyag lha rdzas yal ga 'dud //
T02D3648:261a-35: klu shing me tog bcas pa'o //
T02D3648:261a-36: sangs rgyas sprin ni rab 'phros shing //
T02D3648:261a-37: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'bar //
T02D3648:261a-38: dngos grub chen po mchog bsgom bya //
T02D3648:261a-39: de nas snga ma bzhin du mchod de /
T02D3648:261a-40: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhis drangs nas /
T02D3648:261a-41: dam tshig sems dpa' rang nyid la dgug pa dang /
T02D3648:261a-45: dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3648:261a-46: de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3648:261a-47: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3648:261a-48: de 'og phyag rgya bcings byas la //
T02D3648:261a-49: mnyam par gzhag par gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D3648:261a-50: lag gnyis so sor dag tu bya //
T02D3648:261b-0: khu tshur bcings te @261b sdigs mdzub gnyis //
T02D3648:261b-1: mthe bo'i dbus su gzhug bya ste //
T02D3648:261b-2: me tog rnam pa'i mchod pas so //
T02D3648:261b-3: aom meem mee tri mee tri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3648:261b-4: 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3648:261b-7: dge bshes ston pas bsgyur ba las dus phyis pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i dang ;
T02D3648:261b-8: gnubs lo ts'a bas dag par bcos so //
